entry.title: IW66 search with assembly number shows no result
entry.content:
Hello,

when I use IW66 an select no search criterias, I got a search result (see screenshot1 in the attachment). When I try to search only with the assembly number, I got the message "No objects were selected" (screenshot3 in the attachment).

Does anyone knows why the search with assembly number ist not working?.

Best regards,

Stefan

entry.title: SAP Best practice not available after Upgrade to S/4 AHAN 2023
entry.content:
We have upgraded to S/4 2023 Private cloud. However new sap best practices along with sample data ( New Order type.,Notification type  for Corrective, Emergency etc) are not available. How to get them in system.

 

BH1Corrective Maintenance
BH2Emergency Maintenance
BJ2Preventive Maintenance
4HIProactive Maintenance
4HHReactive Maintenance

entry.title: IK34- Collective Entry of Measurement Document
entry.content:
Hi All ,

Greetings , 

We have created measurement entry list & now need to enter the collective reading using t-code IK34 . However, user need to enter reading one by one for each measuring point . Instead of this, user want to copy the reading from excel sheet . Is it possible to copy counter reading from excel sheet ?

Thanking you in advance .

Best Regards 

Mohammed

entry.title: Calculation Key in Operations of work Order
entry.content:

For Control Key PM03 calculation key - 0 (Maintained Individually) is coming by default. Is it standard behaviour or is there any config for this?

Regards,

Jaya

entry.title: Work cost not calculated for control key PM03
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We have an operation with control Key PM03, for that operation we have done time entry in CAT2 and CAT9. The actual work maintained in CATSDB table is being populated in the actual work field in work order operation but the cost are not reflected. Why so?

Regards,

Jaya

Regards ,

Ashu

entry.title: Data Source for Change History of Work Order Object List and Functional Location of each operation
entry.content:
Hi,
 
We are trying to retrieve change history of Object List under Work order and function location assigned to each operation, and we have checked  CDHDR/CDPOS (changelog in SAP),  but  found no relevant change records for object list - functional location.
 
We are wondering
  • Are there any other sources available (e.g., standard tables, CDS views, APIs, etc) that contain this type of change history?
  • Or is CDHDR/CDPOS the only option, but change tracking must be properly configured in SAP.
Any guidance on how to retrieve this kind of change information would be greatly appreciated.  
 
Thanks!

entry.title: Restrict the app F2175 Find Maintenance Order to show orders that an user is responsible for
entry.content:
Hello Everyone - I would like to restrict the orders displayed in the app, F2175 (Find Maintenance Order). I searched in SAP Community and could not find helpful information. Any pointers on how this can be achieved would be of great help.

Steps:

Access the app from launchpad

Clicking on the GO button should display only orders that I am responsible for.

I know we can do "Adapt Filters" and restrict on our personnel number. But this is a user specific setting. I want to restrict based on "Personnel Number" entered.

Thanks,

Phani

entry.title: Reported By doesn't show all users in Request Maintenance App (F1511)
entry.content:
Hello,

When we try to create a "Request Maintenance" using the Request Maintenance App (F1511), my user does not appear in the "Reported By" field. I do have a user account in the S/4HANA environment. We have tried creating an HR Master Record (PA30) and also set up a Business Partner (BP), but none of these steps have resolved the issue.

We are performing this validation in our development system as part of a new EAM project implementation. In the development environment, HR Master data is not synchronized with SuccessFactors, so we do not have access to all HR Master records. For this reason, we are attempting to create users manually.

Any guidance or pointers on how to resolve this would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,
Phani

entry.title: Derivation of Profitcenter in PM-Order
entry.content:
When creating a PM-Order the Profit center is taken from Material master. When a responsible Cost center is entered it should overwrite Profit center from Material master with Profit center of responsible Cost center. But it doesn't work.

Jagadeesh

entry.title: General Task List Approval Process
entry.content:
Hello,

I need help with a specific topic. A customer wants to implement an approval process for general task lists.

They do not want the process to proceed when a general task list is created or changed without manager approval.

The idea is to create a custom Z-table to store the information temporarily, and once approval is given, use the appropriate BAPI â€” either EAM_TASKLIST_CREATE or EAM_TASKLIST_CHANGE depending on the task â€” to proceed with the process in alignment with the approval flow.

However, my main issue is that some of these general task lists are linked to calibrations, and I couldnâ€™t find a suitable BAPI for this part. Could you help me with this? Is there any BAPI available to handle MIC (Master Inspection Characteristic) linkage for Type A general task lists?

I considered using a BDC, but Iâ€™m not sure if a BAPI and BDC can be executed in sequence reliably. Also, this is not a one-time upload or update â€” itâ€™s an ongoing process. Thatâ€™s why I donâ€™t think BDC would be an effective solution, as it can easily fail if the data deviates even slightly from the expected format.

I would appreciate your support.

Best Regard

entry.title: Random Error message when performing time confirmation in find order operation F2173
entry.content: When  we try to perform time confirmation in find order operation app F2173 without any value in the personnel number field, the resulting error message  which is random and does not have enough  explanation for the details of the error. We need to have a clear message indicating the personnel number in the time confirmation is missing. Do we have amy OSS note to fix this problem.

entry.title: IK18 - mass deactivate multiple measurement documents
entry.content:
We are currently using transaction IK18 in SAP S/4HANA DIGITS, and we have a business need to mass deactivate multiple measurement documents at once. However, in the standard functionality, it is only possible to deactivate documents one by one â€” there is no option to select multiple entries and perform a mass deactivation.

I have already searched for a business function, user exit, BAdI, or enhancement that could allow this functionality, but I was not successful in finding anything available.

Could you please let me know:

  1. Is there any standard functionality, business function, or configuration that enables mass deactivation of measurement documents in IK18?

  2. If not, is there any recommended approach for implementing a custom development (e.g., BAdI, enhancement, or custom transaction/report) to achieve this?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Unexpected Behavior with Team Filter in Peform Maintenance Jobs
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Iâ€™m encountering an issue with team management in  the "Manage Teams and Responsibilities for Work Centers" tile.

Context:

Iâ€™ve created a team using this app and assigned members to work centers. However, this setup has no impact on the filters used to view jobs associated with a team.

SAP Documentation:

According to the official documentation:

"If no work center has been specified in the Personalization app, the system considers the team defined in the Manage Teams and Responsibilities app."
(SAP Help Documentation)

So, in theory, if no default value is set in the Personalization app, the system should rely on the team definition from Manage Teams and Responsibilities. However, this doesnâ€™t seem to work as expected:

  • If I use the Personalization App to set a Work Center, the job filter reacts properly.

  • If I remove the personalization and rely only on the team setup, no jobs appear.

Hypothesis and Question:

Iâ€™ve noticed that when HR assignments are made directly at the work center level, the jobs are displayed correctly.

This raises a few questions:

  • Are the teams defined in Manage Teams and Responsibilities (type MAINT_TEAM) implicitly or necessarily linked to HR data or should the job filter work without relying on HR assignments?

  • Is there a configuration step or mapping needed between MAINT_TEAM and HR objects (e.g., position, person, organizational unit)?

Thank you in advance for your insights or any experience you can share on this!

Best regards

entry.title: Find Maintenance Order & Operations F2173-"Change Assignment" only if the user is Person Responsible
entry.content:
Hello Team - In "Find Maintenance Order and Operations (App: F2173)" We have a requirement to allow "Change Assignment" only when the user is assigned as a person responsible in the tab, Organizational Data --> Partner functions. Can we achieve this? If yes, kindly help me understand how. I am currently trying to debug the DPC_EXT and underlying classes to check the feasibility.

Thanks,

Phani

entry.title: Need a Function Module for mass activation/inactivation of Measuring Point in SAP
entry.content:
Measuring Point can be marked active/inactive individually using tcode IK02> Measuring Point> Functions> Activate/Inactivate.
But for doing it for multiple measuring points at once in bulk- a function module is needed.
Need help in that regard.

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
